actions.text: Read second time and referred to Senate Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB; Treasury Department; Health and Human Services Department.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to provide for a one year transitional benefit for a widow or widower whose spouse died while such widow or widower was between ages of 50 and 60.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance
subjects_top_term: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act to provide a transitional benefit for up to one year for widows and widowers who were between the ages of 50 and 60 when their spouses died.

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to provide for a one year transitional benefit for a widow or widower whose spouse died while such widow or widower was between ages of 50 and 60.
